snippet: Next week, the United States Geological Survey will present a report on the increase in earthquakes in Oklahoma and Arkansas related to the natural gas industry, but it will identify more than one technique as the likely cause.
abstract: Next week, the United States Geological Survey will present a report on the increase in earthquakes in Oklahoma and Arkansas related to the natural gas industry, but it will identify more than one technique as the likely cause.

headline.main: More on the Link Between Earthquakes and Fracking
